title: Native mobile or tablet - third party components and device capabilities
mainAdvice: Answer the following questions about your mobile or tablet based Solution
additionalAdvice: This information will be visible to buyers on your Solution page.

third-party-components.additionalAdvice: Add any information about the third party components required for your Solution to function.
third-party-components.footerAdvice: You can enter up to 500 characters

errorResponse.maxLength: Third party components is over the character limit

device-capabilities.additionalAdvice: Add any information about the device capabilities required for your Solution to function.
device-capabilities.footerAdvice: You can enter up to 500 characters

errorResponse.maxLength: Device capabilities is over the character limit
